parameters.name: filter by extension
parameters.description: Look for the specified file extension in the bucket returned by the query

parameters.name: split files
parameters.description: Split vs group the files across jobs if multiple relevant files are found per asset. Default is split

parameters.name: tasks per job
parameters.description: The number of tasks per job. Default is 1 task per job. For example, if this is set to 3 and there are 10 tasks, then there will be 4 jobs.

parameters.name: docDB query
parameters.description: The query as a json string for fetching data assets, or path to json file containing the query.  Path is /data/input_query.json
parameters.help_text: The query as a dictionary for fetching data assets. Or the path to a json file with the query. Path is `/data/input_query.json`

parameters.name: docDB group by field
parameters.description: Reference to a single docDB record field to use to group records into jobs. For example 'subject.subject_id'
parameters.help_text: Reference to a single docDB record field to use to group records into jobs

parameters.name: use data asset input from csv
parameters.description: Read in list of data asset ids instead of query
parameters.help_text: Read in a list of data asset ids from predefined csv instead of specifying query

parameters.name: maximum number of tasks dispatched
parameters.description: Maximum number of tasks to be dispatched
